--- create_table_cluster.sql
create table foo (
  foo int64,
  bar int64
) primary key (),
  interleave in parent foobar

--- AST
&parser.CreateTable{
  pos:  0,
  end:  91,
  Name: &parser.Ident{
    pos:  13,
    end:  16,
    Name: "foo",
  },
  Columns: []*parser.ColumnDef{
    &parser.ColumnDef{
      end:  30,
      Name: &parser.Ident{
        pos:  21,
        end:  24,
        Name: "foo",
      },
      Type: &parser.ScalarSchemaType{
        pos:  25,
        Name: "INT64",
      },
      NotNull: false,
      Options: (*parser.ColumnDefOptions)(nil),
    },
    &parser.ColumnDef{
      end:  43,
      Name: &parser.Ident{
        pos:  34,
        end:  37,
        Name: "bar",
      },
      Type: &parser.ScalarSchemaType{
        pos:  38,
        Name: "INT64",
      },
      NotNull: false,
      Options: (*parser.ColumnDefOptions)(nil),
    },
  },
  PrimaryKeys: []*parser.IndexKey{},
  Cluster:     &parser.Cluster{
    pos:       60,
    end:       91,
    TableName: &parser.Ident{
      pos:  85,
      end:  91,
      Name: "foobar",
    },
    OnDelete: "",
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE TABLE foo (foo INT64, bar INT64) PRIMARY KEY (), INTERLEAVE IN PARENT foobar
